RegionShape[source]

Enum = [NONE, CIRCLE, ELLIPSE, POINT, POLYGON, RECTANGLE]

The supported region shape types

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

parse_region_shape[source]

parse_region_shape(shape_str)

Try to parse the region shape from a string representation. shape_str: the shape as string return: the parsed RegionShape raises: ValueError if unsupported shape parsed

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Region[source]

Region(shape=<RegionShape.NONE: 'none'>, points_x=None, points_y=None, radius_x=0, radius_y=0, labels=None)

A region shape: the region shape points_x: a list of points x-coordinates points_y: a list of points y-coordinates radius_x: a radius on x-coordinate radius_y: a radius on y-coordinate labels: a set of region labels

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Annotation[source]

Annotation(annotation_id=None, file_path=None, regions=None)

A annotation for a file. annotation_id: a unique annotation identifier file_name: the file file_path: the file path regions: A list of regions

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Annotation.labels[source]

Annotation.labels()

Returns a list of labels, assigned to the annotation. return: a list of labels

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

convert_region[source]

convert_region(region:Region, target_shape:RegionShape)

Convert region to target shape. region: the region to convert target_shape: the target shape to convert to

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

region_bounding_box[source]

region_bounding_box(region:Region)

Calculates the region bounding box. region: the region return: a tuple of points_x and points_y

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class AnnotationAdapter[source]

AnnotationAdapter() :: ABC

Abstract Base Adapter to inherit for writing custom adapters

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

AnnotationAdapter.read[source]

AnnotationAdapter.read()

Read annotations. return: the annotations as dictionary

AnnotationAdapter.write[source]

AnnotationAdapter.write(annotations)

Write annotations. annotations: the annotations to write

AnnotationAdapter.argparse[source]

AnnotationAdapter.argparse(prefix=None)

Returns the argument parser containing argument definition for command line use. prefix: a parameter prefix to set, if needed return: the argument parser

AnnotationAdapter.assign_prefix[source]

AnnotationAdapter.assign_prefix(arg_name, prefix=None)

Assign a parameter prefix to a given argument name. (e.g --prefix_) arg_name: the argument name to prefix prefix: the prefix return: the prefixed argument name
